make_afib_flag_df <- function(data, cutoff_days) {
  data %>%
    mutate(
      afib_by_cutoff = as.integer(
        !is.na(time_to_outcome_afib_aflutter_new_post) &
          time_to_outcome_afib_aflutter_new_post <= cutoff_days))}

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
#Random Forest â€“ 180 Days Without ECG
set.seed(123)
trainIndex_rf <- createDataPartition(df180_noecg$afib_by_cutoff, p = 0.8, list = FALSE)
train_rf_180_noecg <- df180_noecg[trainIndex_rf, ]
test_rf_180_noecg <- df180_noecg[-trainIndex_rf, ]


# Train RF model
rf_model_180_noecg <- ranger(
  afib_by_cutoff ~ ., 
  data = train_rf_180_noecg,
  num.trees = 100,
  probability = TRUE,
  respect.unordered.factors = "partition",
  na.action = "na.omit"
)

# Predict
rf_pred_180_noecg <- predict(rf_model_180_noecg, data = test_rf_180_noecg)$predictions[,2]
rf_class_180_noecg <- ifelse(rf_pred_180_noecg > 0.5, 1, 0)
actual_rf_180_noecg <- test_rf_180_noecg$afib_by_cutoff

# Confusion Matrix
confusionMatrix(as.factor(rf_class_180_noecg), as.factor(actual_rf_180_noecg))

# Precision-Recall
pr_rf_180_noecg <- pr.curve(
  scores.class0 = rf_pred_180_noecg[actual_rf_180_noecg == 1],
  scores.class1 = rf_pred_180_noecg[actual_rf_180_noecg == 0],
  curve = TRUE
)
plot(pr_rf_180_noecg, main = "PR Curve - RF 180 Days No ECG", col = "darkgreen")

get_calib_data <- function(pred, actual, bins = 10) {
  calib_df <- data.frame(pred = pred, actual = actual)

  breaks <- unique(quantile(calib_df$pred, probs = seq(0, 1, length.out = bins + 1)))
  
  if (length(breaks) < 3) {
    stop("Not enough unique predicted values to form bins.")
  }

  calib_df$bin <- cut(calib_df$pred, breaks = breaks, include.lowest = TRUE)

  calib_summary <- calib_df %>%
    group_by(bin) %>%
    summarise(
      bin_midpoint = mean(pred),
      observed = mean(actual),
      .groups = "drop"
    )
  return(calib_summary)
}

# Calibration
rf_calib_180_noecg <- get_calib_data(rf_pred_180_noecg, actual_rf_180_noecg)
ggplot(rf_calib_180_noecg, aes(x = bin_midpoint, y = observed)) +
  geom_point() + geom_line() +
  geom_abline(slope = 1, intercept = 0, linetype = "dashed", color = "gray") +
  labs(title = "Calibration - RF 180 No ECG", x = "Predicted Probability", y = "Observed Rate") +
  theme_minimal()

# ROC
rf_roc_180_noecg <- roc(actual_rf_180_noecg, rf_pred_180_noecg)
plot(rf_roc_180_noecg, col = "blue", main = "ROC - RF 180 Days No ECG")
auc(rf_roc_180_noecg)

#SHAP
predict_rf_prob_noecg <- function(model, newdata) {
  pred <- predict(model, data = newdata)$predictions
  return(pred[, 2])
}

predictor_rf_noecg <- Predictor$new(
  model = rf_model_180_noecg,
  data = train_rf_180_noecg[, -which(names(train_rf_180_noecg) == "afib_by_cutoff")],
  y = train_rf_180_noecg$afib_by_cutoff,
  predict.fun = predict_rf_prob_noecg,
  class = "1")

shap_rf_noecg <- Shapley$new(
  predictor_rf_noecg,
  x.interest = test_rf_180_noecg[1, -which(names(test_rf_180_noecg) == "afib_by_cutoff")]
)

plot(shap_rf_noecg)
```

#SHAP
predict_rf_prob <- function(model, newdata) {
  pred <- predict(model, data = newdata)$predictions
  return(pred[, 2])  # 2nd column = prob of class 1
}


predictor_rf <- Predictor$new(
  model = rf_model_180_ecg,
  data = train_rf_180_ecg[, -which(names(train_rf_180_ecg) == "afib_by_cutoff")],
  y = train_rf_180_ecg$afib_by_cutoff,
  predict.fun = predict_rf_prob
)

shap_rf <- Shapley$new(predictor_rf, x.interest = test_rf_180_ecg[1, -which(names(test_rf_180_ecg) == "afib_by_cutoff")])
plot(shap_rf)
